title: Nevada State Income Tax Calculator | Authoritative, Accessible & Fast

formulas.title: Formula (extracted LaTeX)
formulas.latex: I_a = \begin{cases} A & \text{if amount is provided per year} \\ P \times N & \text{if amount is provided per paycheck} \end{cases}
formulas.raw: I_a = \begin{cases} A & \text{if amount is provided per year} \\ P \times N & \text{if amount is provided per paycheck} \end{cases}

formulas.title: Formula (extracted text)
formulas.raw: Nevada state income tax equals zero regardless of taxable income. Effective rate is zero. Annualized income conversion: $$ I_a = \begin{cases} A & \text{if amount is provided per year} \\ P \times N & \text{if amount is provided per paycheck} \end{cases} $$ Per-paycheck income: $$ I_p = \dfrac{I_a}{N} $$ Nevada state income tax: $$ T_{NV} = 0 \times I_a = 0 $$ Effective Nevada state tax rate: $$ r_{eff} = \dfrac{T_{NV}}{I_a} = 0\% $$

variables.meaning: property tax (annual or monthly depending on input)
